strategic_direction.title: KSA's Strategic Direction
strategic_direction.vision_quote: Our Vision is a strong, thriving, and stable Saudi Arabia that provides opportunity for all. Our Vision is a tolerant country with Islam as its constitution and moderation as its method. We will welcome qualified individuals from all over the world and will respect those who have come to join our journey and our success.

investor_matchmaking.title: Investor Matchmaking
investor_matchmaking.subtitle: A digital service that empowers investors to explore opportunities and build partnerships through a smart matching journey designed to drive economic growth.
investor_matchmaking.what_is_description: It aims to consolidate public sector projects and potential investment opportunities in one place, facilitating communication between investors and project providers to enhance growth and economic development.

partner_access.title: Partner access
partner_access.description: This service allows you to explore registered companies that are actively seeking to form investment partnerships in Saudi Arabia. Through the Partner Directory—a smart tool within the Matchmaking Service - you can easily connect with potential local and international partners, and streamline the matchmaking process through a seamless and secure digital experience that enhances investment collaboration.

opportunity_listing.title: Opportunity Listing
opportunity_listing.description: Browse and discover investment opportunities available in Saudi Arabia from various sectors and regions.

partnership_matching.title: Partnership Matching
partnership_matching.description: Find the right partners for your investment journey through our intelligent matching system.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: The Ministry of Investment offers digital services related to registrations to streamline the procedures for obtaining the necessary permits and conducting investment activities for starting and sustaining projects, ensuring that investors comply with the required regulations and standards.

services.issuing_registration: Issuing Investment Registration To Start Investment Activities
services.converting_registration: Converting An Investment Registration To National, And The Optionally Canceling The Registration.

rhq_service.title: Regional Headquarters Program (RHQ)
rhq_service.subtitle: Saudi Arabia Is A Dynamic, Globally Influential Economic Powerhouse In The Middle East, Offering Diverse Landscapes, Climates, And A Rich Cultural Heritage That Blends Tradition With Modernity

pre_location.title: Pre Location
pre_location.description: Saudi Arabia is actively recognizing its potential, seizing opportunities, and driving economic growth both domestically and internationally.

preparation.title: Preparation For The Relocation
preparation.description: Vision 2030 has driven a surge in demand for skilled professionals, with diversification and innovation attracting multinational corporations and creating new opportunities for foreign experts seeking to contribute to the Kingdom's transformation.

arrival.title: Arrival In KSA
arrival.description: Discover essential resources and guidance to ease your transition to life in Saudi Arabia. From housing and education to transportation and community integration, build a strong foundation for your family and career in the Kingdom.

living.title: Living In KSA
living.description: Saudi Arabia is a treasure trove of history and culture, offering a glimpse into a rich and storied past. Experience the blend of tradition and modernity that makes life in the Kingdom unique and enriching.
